content.question: In the creation of Lapita pottery, sand was mixed with clay most likely to

choices.label: make the vessels more durable during the firing process
make the walls of the vessels denser, so they could hold water
provide the vessels with a coarse and blackened surface
create patterns on the vessels that were later incised

content.answer: make the vessels more durable during the firing process

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art
